body_html:
Variables should maintain state between calls to run so unless you're reinitializing the weights between every minibatch, you shouldn't have an issue. An example demonstrating your problem would be helpful.

Also, this question would be better suited for Stack Overflow than a GH issue

Also, this question would be better suited for Stack Overflow than a GH issue
body:
Variables should maintain state between calls to `run` so unless you're reinitializing the weights between every minibatch, you shouldn't have an issue. An example demonstrating your problem would be helpful.

Also, this question would be better suited for Stack Overflow than a GH issue
